fields.name: Soft-Touch Ballpoint Pens - Set Of 4
fields.description: Had enough of those rough, uncomfortable and annoying pens? Well drop the old biro and pick up a soft touch ballpoint pen instead! In four calming pastel colours including yellow, pink, blue and green, it's time to write the right way.

fields.name: Multi Gel Pens - Pack of 8
fields.description: A set of gel pens is a stationery essential, especially when they're in a range of fun colours. This set contains 8 pens in a range of neon and gel colours with clear frosted barrels. They write smoothly and are just the thing to brighten up your lecture, revision or meeting notes.

fields.name: Black Gel Pens - Pack Of 5
fields.description: Prolong your smooth-high-quality writing experience with a set of five no nonsense black gel pens. Never worry about losing the lid or the ink running out with retractable nibs for an easy and simple writing experience.

fields.name: My Thoughts Journal
fields.description: A journal to change your life for the better. Negative thinking can bring out the worst in us, so use this journal to bring some positivity back to your life. Packed with quotes, prompts and space to write and rant, this journal will have you understanding self-acceptance and love.

fields.name: A5 Marble Lifestyle Planner
fields.description: Organise your work-life balance with this luxurious A5 marble lifestyle planner. Inside you have three colour coordinated dividers for your weekly timetable, agenda and general notes. Fill out the daily tasks, write to-do lists, review goals and make shopping lists.

fields.name: Kraft Brown A5 Journal
fields.description: Practical, timeless and simple design are key with the Kraft A5 journal. With plain Kraft brown pages and a back pocket for spare sheets, keeping your ideas and musings together has never been easier.

fields.name: Pastel Stand Up To Do List
fields.description: Make it easy to keep your priorities at the forefront of your mind with our Pastel Stand Up To Do List. Features an embossed pastel blue cover that doubles up as a stand when you fold it over. Use the rose gold pen included to make your notes and tick them off as you go.

fields.name: Rainbow Memo Block
fields.description: Add some positive fun and colour to your desk with this handy Rainbow Memo Block. Perfect for jotting down notes and reminders!

fields.name: Cat Magnets - Set of 6
fields.description: Cute and practical, keep all your important notes, messages and reminders on your fridge or board with the help of our cat magnets.

fields.name: A5 10 Subject Translucent Notebook
fields.description: This 10 subject notebook is the perfect tool to keep all your notes and revision in order. It contains 200 sheets of ruled white paper separated by colourful plastic dividers. Features a protective translucent cover.

fields.name: A4 Happy Days Subject Notebook
fields.description: Chase the rainbow with our Happy Days A4 subject notebook! With 200 lined pages at your disposal, notetaking has never been easier. Use the tab dividers to flick between subjects and follow the happy days dog all the way to the back cover.

fields.name: Rekraft A5 5 Subject Ruled Notebook
fields.description: Get prepped for whatever life throws at you with an A5 5 subject ruled notebook. With plenty of room for your ideas and tabs to keep your notes organised. Plus, a sustainable and classic design from our Re:Kraft range makes for a notebook that will never go out of style.

fields.name: A4 Wildflower Notebooks - Set of 2
fields.description: Pretty patterns for your notes! This useful notebook set features a blue floral and dot theme and lined pages. Add dreams, plans, shopping lists or whatever you choose!

fields.name: A6 Bee Happy Notebooks - Set of 3
fields.description: Be prepared for any occasion with this set of three pocket-sized A6 notebooks. Includes lined, grid and dotted pages with each cover decorated with an adorable plant design.

fields.name: A5 Strawberry Exercise Notebook
fields.description: Juicy and sweet, make a statement with this A5 Exercise Notebook featuring a bold strawberry graphic on a pastel pink background. Contains 112 white lined pages, a space to label your notebook and a slim flexible cover for portability.

fields.name: Butterfly Garden A4 Filing Box
fields.description: Filing doesn't have to be boring. Whether you're in the office or working from home, introduce our vibrant filing box to spruce up your working space. It's compact enough to slot into small spaces but large enough to hold multiple documents.

fields.name: Kraft Black 4 Drawer Desk Unit
fields.description: Tidy up your desk area and keep all your stationary organised with a little set of drawers - perfect for your office, at home or work. With four drawers to keep your pens, pencils and so much more organised for fuss-free, easy storage.

fields.name: Gold Spot Filing Box
fields.description: Keep your files in order with a gorgeous gold spot filing box. Featuring a simple yet stunnign white and gold design and a large size to keep all your important documents, papers and bills together and in one place.

fields.name: Luna Magazine Holder
fields.description: Tired of magazines cluttering your coffee table? Keep them all together with a stunning magazine file from our space-inspired Luna range. Combining warming pinks with calming blues and rose gold accents for a truly one-of-a-kind storage solution.

fields.name: Pastel Deboss Magazine File
fields.description: Pretty in pink - this large magazine file allows plenty of space for your A4 folders, notes and other important sheets. Keep on your desk or shelving unit to quickly access your work.

fields.name: Green Eden Magazine File
fields.description: If you have multiple magazines that need a place to stay, house them in this stylish magazine file. It features two cranes resting on some lily pads, complemented by a gold streak running down the side.

fields.name: A4 Frosted Lever Arch File
fields.description: This A4 lever arch folder is ideal for storing and organising your paperwork. With a two-hole lever mechanism and clip to secure your contents.  The spine also features a silver eyelet hole so it can easily be removed from a shelf or bookcase.

fields.name: A4 Pastel Lever Arch File
fields.description: A staple for school, home or the office, this A4 lever arch file features a pastel pink debossed grid design with an orange spine, silver thumb hole, two ring mechanism and paper clamp to keep your work safe and organised.

fields.name: A4 Primary Ringbinder
fields.description: Say goodbye to plain and boring stationery with our vibrant orange and yellow ringbinder from our Primary colours collection. Featuring block colours, white stripes and a yellow grid design, this ringbinder is perfect for heading back to school, university or the office.
